title: New: Brandyn Burnette – State I'm In EP
body:
The transition of LA’s Brandyn Burnette to blog-pop sensation has been seemingly overnight, and fascinating to witness.

Listings the likes of John Mayer and Coldplay amongst his inspirations and having a crystal clear visual theme running through his releases, it’s clear that his ambitions are not to be downplayed. His recently released EP, **_State I’m In_**, is his most varied and appealing release to date – merging emotional ballads like Underneath with almost Timberlake-esque pop tracks like Set In Stone and State I’m In. Check out the full EP below, alongside a video for previous EP track, Lost.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
